column4: hmm, it seems I killed something important, I can't right-click on my desktop to open the dialog :-\
does somebody know what program I'm missing?
log out and back in again
thanks, but I assume you mean xserver-xorg
ooh, you must be scared now :-<
I guessed you would handle the problem :-)
and others have better default colour schemes
could you name a fast one for low resource machines?
the ram is the bottleneck I suppose :-p
yea, pterm looks nice, and it's much faster in changing between channel windows in irssi than xfterm4
